html: I continue to pray for the recovery of those injured in the shooting and offer my deepest condolences to the loved ones of the woman who died.
text: I continue to pray for the recovery of those injured in the shooting and offer my deepest condolences to the loved ones of the woman who died.

html: While we mourn this tragedy, we must also come together to condemn anti-Semitism and hate in all their forms, and condemn those who spread it. Every American of every religion has a fundamental right to practice their faith without fear of violence.

html: I will request the EPA examine this incident for any needed updates to the Clean Air Act and Toxic Substances Control Act, as well as ask the National Transportation Safety Board to review our laws and regulations concerning the transportation of hazardous chemicals.
text: I will request the EPA examine this incident for any needed updates to the Clean Air Act and Toxic Substances Control Act, as well as ask the National Transportation Safety Board to review our laws and regulations concerning the transportation of hazardous chemicals.

html: With the spill now cleaned, our communities deserve assurances that we are taking all necessary precautions to prevent a similar accident in the future. The immediate next action is to investigate how this accident happened.
text: With the spill now cleaned, our communities deserve assurances that we are taking all necessary precautions to prevent a similar accident in the future. The immediate next action is to investigate how this accident happened.

html: I am incredibly grateful for the immediate response of roughly 140 first responders who sprung into action to contain and clean up this spill. html: Since the beginning of the investigation, I have repeated that I will be guided by the facts and will follow them wherever they lead. Only by fully understanding what happened in 2016 will help us better defend against foreign efforts to influence future elections.
text: Since the beginning of the investigation, I have repeated that I will be guided by the facts and will follow them wherever they lead. Only by fully understanding what happened in 2016 will help us better defend against foreign efforts to influence future elections.

html: It is important that Congress review the full, unredacted report and that Special Counsel Mueller publicly testify to share these findings with the American public.
text: It is important that Congress review the full, unredacted report and that Special Counsel Mueller publicly testify to share these findings with the American public.

html: In particular, the Special Counsel report makes clear that the President sought repeatedly to undermine and interfere with the investigation, and in some instances was prevented from doing so only by his staff ignoring or refusing to carry out his instructions.
text: In particular, the Special Counsel report makes clear that the President sought repeatedly to undermine and interfere with the investigation, and in some instances was prevented from doing so only by his staff ignoring or refusing to carry out his instructions.

html: The facts as laid out in the report stand in stark contrast to Attorney General Barr’s attempts to spin the conclusions through a pre-release summary and press conference.
text: The facts as laid out in the report stand in stark contrast to Attorney General Barr’s attempts to spin the conclusions through a pre-release summary and press conference.

html: I am pleased that the Special Counsel report is finally public and the American people can now read the findings for themselves on foreign interference in the 2016 election.
text: I am pleased that the Special Counsel report is finally public and the American people can now read the findings for themselves on foreign interference in the 2016 election.

html: Here’s the reality about #VAWA: it saves lives. In the nearly 25 years since it was enacted, intimate partner violence among women has dropped by 65%. We need to build on that progress by passing #VAWA19 – not falling for the NRA’s political games!pic.twitter.com/te0Us0uaG3
text: Here’s the reality about #VAWA: it saves lives. In the nearly 25 years since it was enacted, intimate partner violence among women has dropped by 65%. We need to build on that progress by passing #VAWA19 – not falling for the NRA’s political games!pic.twitter.com/te0Us0uaG3

html: In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed. It's past time for thoughts and prayers. We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV
text:
In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC.

The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed.
 
It's past time for thoughts and prayers.
 
We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV

html: Finally. I proudly voted today to end Congress’s shameful inaction on gun violence by passing #HR8 a bipartisan bill requiring background checks on all gun sales. With commonsense steps like these to prevent future tragedies, we can honor those we’ve lost. #EnoughIsEnoughpic.twitter.com/1hXZZ4Fh5g
text:
Finally. 

I proudly voted today to end Congress’s shameful inaction on gun violence by passing #HR8 a bipartisan bill requiring background checks on all gun sales. With commonsense steps like these to prevent future tragedies, we can honor those we’ve lost. #EnoughIsEnoughpic.twitter.com/1hXZZ4Fh5g

html: It's a shame so many had to needlessly suffer without paychecks for Pres. Trump to come to come to this realization. The men & women of the Coast Guard, TSA, FAA, CBP, FBI, & other agencies who continued to do their duty and work unpaid on our behalf deserve our gratitude.
text:
It's a shame so many had to needlessly suffer without paychecks for Pres. Trump to come to come to this realization. 

The men & women of the Coast Guard, TSA, FAA, CBP, FBI, & other agencies who continued to do their duty and work unpaid on our behalf deserve our gratitude.

html: As I have said from day one, the path out of this shutdown is straightforward: re-open the government, pay our federal workers, and then we can have an honest, open debate about the best way to secure our border without using the livelihoods of thousands of families for leverage.
text: As I have said from day one, the path out of this shutdown is straightforward: re-open the government, pay our federal workers, and then we can have an honest, open debate about the best way to secure our border without using the livelihoods of thousands of families for leverage.

html: It would also ensure public notification for any violations so local communities have the facts about the safety of their air. I appreciate the leadership of @DickDurbin & support of my colleagues on this legislation. This is about our public health, and we need action now.
text: It would also ensure public notification for any violations so local communities have the facts about the safety of their air. I appreciate the leadership of @DickDurbin & support of my colleagues on this legislation. This is about our public health, and we need action now.

html: Today marks two years since the terrible shooting at Pulse nightclub in Orlando that cut short 49 innocent lives. As we remember and mourn, we must also #HonorThemWithAction by standing with our LGBT community to #DisarmHate and finally passing legislation to reduce gun violence.pic.twitter.com/muUVyMk6hv
text: Today marks two years since the terrible shooting at Pulse nightclub in Orlando that cut short 49 innocent lives. As we remember and mourn, we must also #HonorThemWithAction by standing with our LGBT community to #DisarmHate and finally passing legislation to reduce gun violence.pic.twitter.com/muUVyMk6hv

html: Two years after #Pulse, I know that love will win. We will transform our sorrow into love and progress. We will grieve, we will remember, we will unite. html: The ADAPT Act requires prescribers to complete Continuing Medical Education (CME) courses on the potential dangers & risks of prescribing opioids if their state does not already require them to do so. Prescribers are an integral part of the solution. More:https://susanwbrooks.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/brooks-schneider-introduce-the-adapt-act-to-combat-the-opioid-crisis …
text: The ADAPT Act requires prescribers to complete Continuing Medical Education (CME) courses on the potential dangers & risks of prescribing opioids if their state does not already require them to do so. Prescribers are an integral part of the solution. More:https://susanwbrooks.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/brooks-schneider-introduce-the-adapt-act-to-combat-the-opioid-crisis …

html: Opioids are powerful drugs & have the potential to become incredibly addictive. It's imperative our nation’s prescribers receive adequate training before sending a patient home w/a bottle full of pills that could be abused. That's why @RepSchneider & I introduced the ADAPT Act.
text: Opioids are powerful drugs & have the potential to become incredibly addictive. It's imperative our nation’s prescribers receive adequate training before sending a patient home w/a bottle full of pills that could be abused. That's why @RepSchneider & I introduced the ADAPT Act.

html: Holocaust Remembrance Day, or Yom HaShoah, begins tonight. Each year, we pause to remember the 6 million Jews & all others murdered during the Holocaust.
